name: Mashed Killer
description:
A simple horror-themed button mashing game with random elements.

Code: Paul Schell

Art: Alexandre Karimov

Either play as Jason (left) or the victim (right) and outmash your opponent to win! A draw results in the alien victory.

Made for Trent's inaugural GameJam on January 15, 2017.

Post-Jam Changelog:

(1/16/2017) 7zip file changed to zip file.

(1/19/2017) Graphic functionality: hands now indicate to mash buttons. Text should now be readable on the gameplay screen.
